mapper.sql: Select p.product_no, t.type, t.subType, p.name, p.origin, p.volume, p.alcoholLevel, p.sugarLevel, p.acidity, p.weight, p.rate, p.variety, p.photo From product p left outer join product_type t on t.type_no = p.type_no
mapper.select: select type_no, type, subType from product_type order by type_no asc
select type_no, type, subType from product_type where type_no=#{no}
mapper.insert: insert into product(type_no, name, variety, origin, volume, alcoholLevel, sugarLevel, acidity, weight, photo) values(#{productType.number}, #{productName}, #{variety}, #{countryOrigin}, #{volume}, #{alcoholLevel}, #{sugarLevel}, #{acidity}, #{weight}, #{photo})
mapper.select: select p.product_no, p.type_no, p.name, p.origin, p.volume, p.alcoholLevel, p.sugarLevel, p.acidity, p.weight, p.rate, p.variety, t.type, t.subType, p.photo from product p join product_type t on p.type_no=t.type_no where p.product_no=#{no}

select p.product_no, p.type_no, p.name, p.origin, p.volume, p.alcoholLevel, p.sugarLevel, p.acidity, p.weight, p.rate, p.variety, t.type, t.subType, p.photo from product p join product_type t on p.type_no=t.type_no where p.name=#{name}
mapper.update: update product set type_no = #{productType.number}, name = #{productName}, origin=#{countryOrigin}, volume=#{volume}, alcoholLevel=#{alcoholLevel}, sugarLevel=#{sugarLevel}, acidity=#{acidity}, weight=#{weight}, variety=#{variety}, photo=#{photo} where product_no=#{productNumber}
mapper.select: select avg(score) from review where product_no=#{no} group by product_no;
where t.type = #{input} order by p.rate desc limit 0,5
where p.name like #{input} order by p.product_no asc
